title: [K-12] Iterative Learning-based Pedagogy for SMB Process Design and Operation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental chemical engineering and mathematical modeling knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners must understand complex process systems and apply data-driven design methods.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of SMB (Simulated Moving Bed) processes and the importance of flow rate settings for each zone.
Learners can perform SMB process design optimization using Partial Least Squares (PLS)-based data analysis techniques.
Learners can implement model update methods reflecting process drift by applying the dynamic Exponentially Weighted Moving Average (dEWMA) strategy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
